texts.collaboration_announcement: The dream collaboration of popular characters from SNK and CAPCOM!
texts.release_year: The fighting game that debuted in arcades in 2003
texts.game_name: 'SVC CHAOS' is back with an upgraded version!

texts.characters_text3: From SNK, iconic fighting game characters like Kyo Kusanagi, Terry Bogard, and Mai Shiranui appear, along with Mars People and Athena!
texts.characters_text4: From CAPCOM, fighters such as Ryu, Chun-Li, and Demitri join alongside Zero and Red Arremer!
texts.characters_text5: A total of 36 characters from both companies are available for use!
texts.characters_text6: They were hidden characters in the arcade version.
texts.characters_text7: Athena and Red Arremer are available right from the start.
texts.characters_text8: Available for use from the beginning.

battle_system.title: BATTLE SYSTEM
battle_system.subtitle: Battle System
battle_system.text1: Crush or be crushed... The ultimate 1 vs 1 battle!
battle_system.text2: The 'Front Ground Step' allows you to transition into an attack at any time from a step,
battle_system.text3: The 'Groove Power Gauge System' can be charged up to three levels,
battle_system.text4: and the 'Exceed Technique' surpasses super special moves, among other systems!

new_feature.title: Character-specific
new_feature.subtitle: hit detection range
new_feature.description: Newly equipped with 'Hit Detection Display Function'!

new_section.title: Online battles are now more comfortable and exciting!
new_section.description: New rollback netcode and lobby function that supports up to 9 players!
new_section.tournament_mode: A tournament mode that allows you to choose from single, double elimination, and league formats!
new_section.challenge: Challenge players from around the world!

texts.header: Includes key art and character illustrations!
texts.description1: New gallery mode with 89 pieces of key art and character illustrations!
